languages.text: {n}Регина переходит на шепот — так, чтобы ее слышали только вы.{/n} "Его злоба отравляет все вокруг. Вобьет что-то в голову и пойдет сносить чужие, лишь бы доказать свою правоту".

traits.locale_text: {n}Регина переходит на шепот — так, чтобы ее слышали только вы.{/n} "Его злоба отравляет все вокруг. Вобьет что-то в голову и пойдет сносить чужие, лишь бы доказать свою правоту".
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
languages.original_text: {n}Регина переходит на шепот — так, чтобы ее слышали только вы.{/n} "Его злоба отравляет все вокруг. Вобьет что-то в голову и пойдет сносить чужие, лишь бы доказать свою правоту".

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile is poisoning the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something in his head, he stomps off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile is poisoning the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something in his head, he stomps off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜的声音变成了耳语，只有你能听到她在说什么。{/n}“无论他走到哪里，他的呼吸都是在毒害周围的空气。只要他脑子里有了什么念头，他就会把其他人的脑袋砍掉，就为了证明他是对的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜的声音变成了耳语，只有你能听到她在说什么。{/n}“无论他走到哪里，他的呼吸都是在毒害周围的空气。只要他脑子里有了什么念头，他就会把其他人的脑袋砍掉，就为了证明他是对的。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Reginas Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern, so dass nur du sie noch hören kannst.{/n} "Seine Galle vergiftet die Luft um ihn herum, wohin er auch geht. Wenn er sich einmal etwas in den Kopf gesetzt hat, läuft er davon, um anderen die Köpfe abzureißen, nur um zu beweisen, dass er recht hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reginas Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern, so dass nur du sie noch hören kannst.{/n} "Seine Galle vergiftet die Luft um ihn herum, wohin er auch geht. Wenn er sich einmal etwas in den Kopf gesetzt hat, läuft er davon, um anderen die Köpfe abzureißen, nur um zu beweisen, dass er recht hat."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}La voix de Régina se réduit à un murmure de façon à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n} « Où qu'il aille, sa bile empoisonne l'air. Et quand il a quelque chose en tête, il n'hésite pas une seconde à faire trancher celle des autres simplement pour prouver qu'il a raison. »
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Régina se réduit à un murmure de façon à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n} « Où qu'il aille, sa bile empoisonne l'air. Et quand il a quelque chose en tête, il n'hésite pas une seconde à faire trancher celle des autres simplement pour prouver qu'il a raison. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}La voz de Regina se convierte en un susurro que solo tú puedes oír.{/n} «Su bilis envenena el aire que le rodea y, cuando se le mete una idea en la cabeza se lanza a cortar las de otras personas para demostrar que tiene razón».
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Regina se convierte en un susurro que solo tú puedes oír.{/n} «Su bilis envenena el aire que le rodea y, cuando se le mete una idea en la cabeza se lanza a cortar las de otras personas para demostrar que tiene razón».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}レジーナの声は、あなたにだけ聞こえるような小声になる。{/n}「どこに行っても彼は周囲を気まずい空気にしてしまうんですよ。ひとたび何かを思いついたら、自分が正しいことを証明するために、他人の首をはねようとするんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナの声は、あなたにだけ聞こえるような小声になる。{/n}「どこに行っても彼は周囲を気まずい空気にしてしまうんですよ。ひとたび何かを思いついたら、自分が正しいことを証明するために、他人の首をはねようとするんです」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Regina, sesini öyle kısıyor ki fısıltılarını ancak sen duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Huysuzluğuyla gittiği yerin havasını bulandırıyor. Bir şeyi kafasına taktı ya, haklı olduğunu ispat etmek için başkalarının kellesini almaya koyuluyor hemen."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina's voice drops to a whisper so that only you can hear her.{/n} "His bile poisons the air around him wherever he goes. Once he gets something into his head, he hares off to remove the heads of others just to prove that he is in the right."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina sesini öyle kısıyor ki fısıltılarını ancak sen duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Huysuzluğuyla gittiği yerin havasını bulandırıyor bu. Bir şeyi kafasına taktı mı, haklı olduğunu ispat etmek için başkalarının kellelerini almaya koyuluyor hemen."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
